datasets.title: Deposit and share your data. Get academic credit.
datasets.content: Harvard Dataverse is a repository for research data. Deposit data and code here.

collections.title: Organize datasets and gather metrics in your own repository.
collections.content: A collection is a container for all your datasets, files, and metadata.

general.title: Publishing your data is easy on Harvard Dataverse!
general.content: Learn about getting started creating your own dataverse repository here.
